short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The perfect tool for women in business looking to expand their global network and make valuable connections

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WinTrade Global Network Accelerator is the perfect tool for women in business looking to expand their global network and make valuable connections. Our unique business matchmaking system on Tuesdays allows you to easily exchange calendar links and schedule virtual coffee meetings with potential partners, customers, and suppliers. During these meetings, you'll have the opportunity to tell them about the specific customers, partners, or suppliers you're looking for and see if there is a good fit.
If the match is a good one, you can even offer them a sample of your product or service to help seal the deal. And with our LinkedIn add-on, you can see who is in their network through the membersâ€™ directory so that you can be introduced by your matched partner. This way you can expand your network even further.
We also have a feature that allows you to introduce them to at least one person in your network and when you meet that person, mention who introduced you and that you met in the WinTrade Global network. We also have a Network Accelerator Google spreadsheet where you can track all your meetings and follow up on the contact.
With WinTrade Global Network Accelerator, you'll be able to easily connect with the right people, expand your network, and grow your business. Sign up now and start making valuable connections today!
